titles.title: A resolution designating May 8, 2009, as "Military Spouse Appreciation Day".
A resolution designating May 8, 2009, as "Military Spouse Appreciation Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates May 8, 2009, as Military Spouse Appreciation Day.
Honors and recognizes the contributions made by spouses of members of the Armed Forces.
Encourages the people of the United States to observe Military Spouse Appreciation Day.
